citeinfo.origin: Russian Academy of Science, Dept of Earth Science, Commission of Sedimentary Rock, Institute of Oceanology
citeinfo.title: Geographical Description of the Bering Sea: Bottom Relief and Sediments

abstract.p: This volume presents a description of the bottom relief and sediments of the Bering Sea. It is based on original material collected in the course of the five expeditions by the vessel "Vitiaz" in the western part of the Bering Sea during the years 1950-1954.

[Reference: Bezrukov, P.L. (ed). 1959. Geographical Description of the Bering Sea: Bottom Relief and Sediments. Acad. of Sci. of U.S.S.R., Transactions of the Oceanological Institute vol. 29. Moscow. Israel Prog. for Sci. Transl., Jerusalem, 1964, 188 pp.]
This volume may be found at many university libraries.

descript.purpose: Geographical description of the Bering Sea, including sediments.
